name: Shopping Empire Tycoon
description:
Are you ready to be a market tycoon?
If Your Answer Is Yes
So, from the moment you take over your own market, you should be careful and spend your money for market is going bigger.
And Remember, Building An Empire Is A Job Only The Bests Can Do.
And one last reminder if you run a store, you should definitely take care of its safety.



Unlockable objects and features added in each new section.



Upgrades to add value to your products and your storage.



Courses that will both improve your business and evaluate your products.



Antiques that will add money to your money with your experience and earn valued every day.
